file_content.text: Should I receive additional messages, you will be immediately notified.
Hold, please... identities confirmed. Delivering message.
The Emperor's Wrath... confirmed. I bear a message for you.
Lord reclaimer, a message from your subordinates.
Hold, bounty hunter. A message.
Confidential message for you, sir. Authenticating... confirmed. Displaying message.
Scanning identity... confirmed. Delivering message.
Colonel Jadick, Imperial Reclamation Service reporting. We've encountered a first-contact scenario with a primeval species.
General Threnoldt's made his report to the Dark Council, and you've been granted authority to handle the situation.
When I say these beings existed eons before the Rakata Infinite Empire, I'm not exaggerating. I'm doing my best to communicate, but you... you'll want to be here.
Response service is requested. Shall I deliver your reply?
The Empire must present a strong front to these aliens. I will not be intimidated.
It will be dealt with.
I'll interpret this as a favorable reply.
General Threnoldt should have made his report to me directly.
Why wasn't I involved sooner?
You could not be reached, my lord, and time was a factor. The general did ensure the matter would ultimately be left to you.
If these aliens have deep pockets, better hope they're on your side.
They may have a lot to offer.
Negotiations will have to be opened through the proper channels.
Only I am qualified to determine if they're a threat to Imperial security.
You'll need me.
That was the determination of the Dark Council.
It's not every day I get to meet a long lost civilization. I'll be there.
This I have to see.
I will notify Colonel Jadick to expect you soon.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
So noted. A pleasure serving you.
Empire, victorious!
